summary: Software engineer and new media artist with experience in interactive media, web development, and creative technology. Passionate about exploring the intersection of art and technology.

experience.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Led migration to React 19 and Vite, improving build times by 60%
Developed interactive web experiences using Three.js and WebGL
Mentored junior developers and established code review practices

experience.title: Creative Technologist Intern
bullets: Built interactive installations using TouchDesigner and Arduino
Created generative art pieces for gallery exhibitions
Collaborated with artists on immersive multimedia experiences

education.notes: Minor in Art History, Sound and Music Computing focus

projects.name: Memory Fragments
projects.description: VR experience exploring post-colonial identity through fragmented memories

projects.name: Generative Sound Installation
projects.description: Interactive sound-light installation responding to audience movement

writing.title: The Ephemeral Nature of Digital Memory
